summary: In a zombie-infested quarantined zone of East Mission City, investigative reporter Chase Carter must stop a secret government conspiracy.
cast: Jesse Metcalfe|Marie Avgeropoulos|Ian Tracey|Keegan Connor Tracy|Jessica Harmon|Patrick Sabongui|Camille Sullivan|Jim Thorburn|Billy Zane|Dennis Haysbert|Teach Grant|Lee Majdoub|Sandy Robson|Donavon Stinson|Peter Kelamis|Ben Cotton|Viv Leacock|Luvia Petersen|Stephen Lobo|Dakota Guppy|Curtis Lum|Heather Roop|Jim Shield|Victor Webster|Sarah Lindsay|Joshua Roy|Peter Brown|Naomi Kyle
title: Dead Rising: Endgame
